name: we_app_deploy
description: This is an exercise to deploy full stack app

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
scripts.develop: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix client"

author: pallavi priyadarshini
